description: Fit the spectrum of the transient XRT 200515
instructions: Given the spectral files (acisf23022_000N027_r0122_arf3.fits.gz, acisf23022_000N027_r0122_pha3.fits.gz, acisf23022_000N027_r0122_rmf3.fits.gz) from https://huggingface.co/datasets/StevenDillmann/chandra_xray_eventfiles/ and the model specifications detailed in the paper, compute the best-fit parameters for two different models. 1. Compute N_H [units of 10^22 1/cm^2] and Gamma for the powerlaw model. 2. Compute N_H [units of 10^22 1/cm^2] and kT [keV] for the thermal blackbody model. Return the results in a list [N_H_powerlaw, gamma_powerlaw, N_H_thermal,  kT_thermal].
